text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The first half of the year's Twinkle<n>Series ends with Biwa
Hayahide's<n>tremendous victory in the Takarazuka<n>Kinen.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Now with summer here, Team Sirius<n>goes shopping to
prepare for summer<n>camp.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Let's see, there's fireworks,<n>watermelon, carrots... Aaah,
we've<n>got so much to buy!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Prepping for camp is hard, but we'll<n>have a chance to
stretch our legs once<n>we get there. It's a training camp, but<n>
this is also a vacation for us.

text_block_list.name: Shopper A
text_block_list.text: Oh! It's Narita Brian!

text_block_list.name: Shopper B
text_block_list.text:
Wow, it's really her! It was so<n>amazing to see you win the
Derby<n>with that five-length lead!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Thanks...

text_block_list.name: Shopper B
text_block_list.text:
Next up is the third crown, the Kikuka<n>Sho, right? Are you
gonna race the<n>Arima Kinen after that?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Oh, I was wondering that too! Well,<n>Trainer?!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Nothing's set in stone yet, but I'm<n>thinking that'll be the
schedule.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Nothing's set in stone yet, but I'm<n>thinking that'll be the
schedule.

text_block_list.name: Shopper A
text_block_list.text:
Wow! Seeing you take the Triple<n>Crown and go on to win
the Arima<n>Kinen would be amazing! We've got<n>high hopes
for you!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: You don't have to tell me. I'm going<n>to win all my races.

text_block_list.name: Shopper B
text_block_list.text:
Wooow! I'm gonna go watch you<n>with my family! We can't
wait to see<n>your big win!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Everyone is confident in her victory.<n>She deserves nothing
less.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Honestly, it's hard to imagine her<n>losing. At Brian's level,
she's got<n>both the Kikuka Sho and the Arima<n>Kinen in the
bag.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Though depending on her opponents,<n>things might get
shaken up.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: But who could win against her?
Oh? Well, if it isn't Brian.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Isn't that...

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
She's Hishi Amazon, the leader of<n>the Miho dorm. Doing a
little shopping,<n>Amazon?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, the juniors aren't goin' home<n>for summer, so I
thought I'd make a<n>little treat for them.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: They're gonna start calling you dorm<n>mom instead...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Heh, taking care of people isn't just<n>about feeding 'em.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
I set an example on the track too.<n>Whoever you face, you
can take 'em<n>on if you've got the guts!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It sounds like Hishi Amazon's got the<n>same never-fail
attitude as Brian.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Whoa! Watch out!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Screeeech!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Phew, too close for comfort.

text_block_list.name: Shopper's Child
text_block_list.text: Sniffle... Uwaaagh!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Hey! Don't you know to look both<n>ways before crossin'
the road?!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
You've got ol' Hishiama watchin'<n>your back this time, so
let's see you<n>try that again safely, okay?

text_block_list.name: Shopper's Child
text_block_list.text: Sniffle... Thanks, miss...

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Nice moves, Ama.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Hey now, I wouldn't be a good dorm<n>leader if I didn't watch
out for the<n>kids. Now... where were we?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Brian, I'd love to race you out on the<n>track. A battle to see
who's really the<n>best racer! Sounds good?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
One day we'll race each other, so<n>don't go runnin' away
on me!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
I'd never run from a race, but I have<n>no intention of waiting.
If you want it<n>so bad, you'll have to keep up.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Heh, that's the spirit! Anyway, I'm<n>gonna hit up the egg
sale. Later!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: ...Like I said, dorm mom.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Whoa, that almost made my heart<n>stop. Seeing her bust that
speed outta<n>nowhere to save that kid was even<n>more
surprising though!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Have you never seen her race<n>before? It's a sight to
behold when<n>she charges from the back to the<n>very front
near instantaneously.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Some say it's even more impressive<n>than Brian's races.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
With Brian on the radar of a racer like<n>her, we're not lacking
in worthy<n>opponents.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
With Brian on the radar of a racer like<n>her, we're not lacking
in worthy<n>opponents.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: ...Heh.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
So! We're having our summer camp<n>at the Mejiro villa. You
two wanna<n>come?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Sorry, but I'll have to pass. I got<n>injured before the
Takarazuka Kinen,<n>so I'll be visiting the hospital.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Awww... That's a shame. Looks like<n>it's just me and you,
Hayahide!<n>You're in, right?!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: No, count me out as well.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Whaaa?! But there's gonna be<n>fireworks and watermelon
and<n>carrots!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Sorry, I have something that needs<n>attending to.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Don't tell me you're working on<n>summer homework. Is that
what<n>you've been scribbling in your<n>notebook?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Huh? Wh-what is this?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Muscle and core training... Sprints on<n>dirt and ramps... Gate
training and pool<n>training... wow, the notebook's<n>
completely filled!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: No way, you're gonna do all thisstuff for summer?!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I am. I need to prepare for the races<n>in the fall—both the All
Comers and the<n>Tenno Sho.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Then finally... I'll hit the Arima Kinen.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
You're going for the Arima Kinen?!<n>That means you and
Brian are gonna<n>be in the same race!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: A worthy opponent...
